title: Border, ca. 1600
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: grid of laid cords with needle lace (reticella style)
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Squares filled with an alternating design of human forms and abstract motifs. Pattern interspersed by portes and connected by brides.
